trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for a class that is derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl"></xref> class.

Typically, when creating a new data source class for hierarchical data and an accompanying designer, you would inherit the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HierarchicalDataSourceDesigner> class rather than implement the IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner interface.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
The CanConfigure property is used by a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], to determine whether to display a **Configure** command at design time.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the underlying data source has a configuration wizard that can be launched with <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.Configure*>, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.

The CanRefreshSchema property is used by a design host, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], to determine whether to display a **Refresh Schema** command at design time.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Launches the configuration wizard for the underlying data source.
Occurs when a data source control has changed in some way that affects data-bound controls.
To be added.
Gets the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
The XPath for the part of the data source to retrieve.
The named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
Refreshes the schema of the underlying data source.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to suppress events raised while refreshing the schema; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Restores events after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents*> method.
Occurs when the fields or data of the underlying data source have changed.
To be added.
Turns off events in the data source control.
You can restore events with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHierarchicalDataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> method.
